titleStmt.title: A practical discourse of prayer wherein is handled the nature, the duty, the qualifications of prayer, the several sorts of prayer, viz. ejaculatory, publick, private and secret prayer : with the necessity of, and ingagements unto, prayer : together with sundry cases of conscience about it / by Thomas Cobbet.
titleStmt.author: Cobbet, Thomas, 1608-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.M. for Joseph Cranford ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
